description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for a manager interface, specifically a screen for managing locations and time slots. It includes a stateless widget that builds a scaffold with an app bar, permission checks, and displays placeholder sections for location and timeslot management. The file also contains private widget classes for UI components like headers and list rows.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget for the manager's locations and time slots screen, handling UI rendering based on user permissions.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A private widget that displays a styled header section with an icon and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private widget representing a styled row with an icon and text, used as a list item.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen, including permission check and conditional UI display.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the _SectionHeader widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the _Row widget, displaying a row with an icon and label.
